rain_descr: Activate rain to instantly grow your crops to their maximum yield without waiting! Collect your fully grown harvest immediately!
invite_descr: You and your friend will receive bonuses
invite_1: Join our Referral Program and earn commissions from three levels of referrals and 2000 for each referral:
greeting1: Welcome to Happy Coin Farm – the unique game where you grow digital coins and earn real money!
greeting2: Upgrade your farm, buy boosts, enhance your coins, and harvest crops. Check in EVERY HOUR to collect your money harvest!
greeting3: Soon, we’re launching on Crypto.com, Bybit, OKX, and WhiteBit. Start earning now!
greeting4: Here's our welcome bonus for you! Enjoy X coins right now. Play and earn!
guide1: Unlock new coins or buy fertilizers and increase your yield per hour
guide2: Buy Boosters so you can harvest less frequently
guide3: Invite friends and earn income from three levels of referrals
guide4: Invite more friends and new leagues with income multipliers will open up to you
guide5: Complete tasks and get rewards for them
guide6: You can make it rain and the crops will instantly grow and be ready for picking
wheel: Win FarmCoins or money in our games and competitions
wallet: Connect or create a cryptocurrency wallet via Telegram
wallet1: You can disable it or copy the wallet address
wheel_reward_fail: Oops. Today is not your day. Come back tomorrow
